message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $950,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective, but the value of this product is quite high. Would you consider $900,000? I'm confident it's a price that reflects its true worth.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $850,000. Can you consider meeting me at this price?
